wikipedia_page.main: John Hopkins Lowden (born  1 May 1953) is a British art historian who is Professor of the History of Art at the Courtauld Institute, which he joined in 1982.Lowden is a graduate of Cambridge University and previously taught at St. Andrews. His specialism is in illuminated manuscripts.
